title: Pretty Little Mistakes
description: There are hundreds of lives sown inside Pretty Little Mistakes, Heather McElhatton's singularly spectacular, breathtakingly unique novel that has more than 150 possible endings. You may end up in an opulent mansion or homeless down by the river; happily married with your own corporation or alone and pecked to death by ducks in London; a Zen master in Japan or morbidly obese in a trailer park.Is it destiny or decision that controls our fate? You can't change your past and start over from scratch in real lifeâ€”but in Pretty Little Mistakes, you can! But be warned, choose wisely.
author: Heather McElhatton
